teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.

teams.name: MicroCredit Program
teams.loan_because: The MicroCredit Program provides UST undergraduate students with a unique educational opportunity to learn practical ways and means to effect meaningful improvement in the lives of the world’s poor through active management of the Fund. By participation in the Program, these students will have the opportunity to learn practical methods by which freedom, equality, democracy and social justice may be enhanced by small loans to the poor.
teams.description: The Center for International Studies Micro-Credit Program is dedicated toassisting micro-entrepreneurs living below the poverty threshold to start income generating businesses. The program seeks to promote freedom, fairness and democracy around the world by endorsing basic principles of micro-entrepreneurship, self-employment, property rights, and wealth accumulation, while integrating the Catholic values of the University of St. Thomas.

teams.name: Capitalism Over Socialism
teams.loan_because: Free Enterprise is the only way for people to prosper. Since one of the ingredients that allows Free Enterprise to flourish is capital, someone has to provide it. We want to be that someone.
teams.description: We like to empower individuals to take charge of their own destiny by giving them access to money when traditional institutions will not.. This task is much better left to the private citizen, and not the government.

teams.name: Jacob's Well
teams.loan_because: its amazing what one person can do to change the life of another.
teams.description:
We started this at Christmas time in 2008 and many have kept on going.  What a great way to make an impact in the world and keep making an impact.

Jacob's Well is a movement of people figuring out what the church can be like in today's world.

teams.name: 43things
teams.description: We're all fans of the website 43things...

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster

http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm
teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

and

teams.description: We are a community for lenders by lenders. We welcome Kiva.org lenders to participate in our lender forums at KivaFriends.org

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Team California
teams.loan_because: Our state rules and we care about the world around us!
teams.description: We are from the great state of California!

teams.name: Kiva Africa
teams.loan_because: We love Africa

teams.name: TAX ADVISORS
teams.loan_because: That's great to help people for a project THEY build without patronizing them.
teams.description: The target is to put together all the people advising or dealing in tax matters because they know how much one $ is one $. So they know, for sure, how even one dollar can help.

teams.name: Poker Players
teams.loan_because: we want to help others

teams.name: Animal Lovers
teams.loan_because: Even as animals living in a developed country - we are better off  than humans in many parts of the world.
teams.description: We are animal lovers who want to help those less fortunate in the poor areas of the world.

teams.name: Swiss Kiva
teams.description: Residents, citizens, and fans of Switzerland with a common interest in supporting the entrepreneurs of the developing world.

teams.name: Kiva Guernsey
teams.loan_because: We can!

teams.name: Inspiration
teams.loan_because: We are all members of the same world family.
teams.description: There are many roads leading to the same destination. We are inspired by sages and mystics from many different traditions.

teams.name: Kiva San Francisco
teams.loan_because: a little goes a long way.

teams.name: Cats Are People Too.
teams.loan_because: We, the lovers of cats, loan  because it makes us sad to see how tragic are some lives simply because they are poor.  That can, and must change, and it will change.  The world can never be purrfect, but it can be happier!
teams.description: How can we cat lovers help you?  We don't have much, but we're willing to share, IF you are willing to help yourselves.  We only want for this world to be a better place, for everyone, even cats.

teams.name: Chicago
teams.loan_because: we care....
teams.description: Chicago has a big heart.

teams.name: Book Readers, Writers & Bloggers United
teams.loan_because: We recognize that even the smallest donations can have a great impact, and when we team together that impact can only be so much the greater!
teams.description: We are a diverse group of people with at least one thing in common: we love books.

teams.name: TEAM TIBET
teams.loan_because: we care..
teams.description: Believe each and everyone can make a difference.

teams.name: UC Davis
teams.loan_because: We feel strongly that inspiring people to make a difference in their own lives effects us all.
teams.description: A connected group of alumni, students, faculty, staff and friends of UC Davis

teams.name: SF Bay Area
teams.loan_because: We can and we want to.
teams.description: Relaxed. No competition nor pressure to lend.

teams.name: WORLD PEACE
teams.loan_because: We want to promote a harmonious, eco-sustainable, and prosperous human civilization on planet Earth.
teams.description: We envision and to promote a world of enduring peace, universal sustainable development, and advancement of human civilization.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Ubisoft Inc.
teams.loan_because: There's not enough giving in this world so every little bit helps.
teams.description: We produce, publish and distribute interactive entertainment products (video games). Our division focuses on the Americas.

teams.name: 101 Cookbooks
teams.loan_because: There were nearly a million visits to 101 Cookbooks last month - a statistic that continues to amaze me. As the site has grown over the years, I kept thinking to myself that it would be great to figure out a way for us to affect change as a group - Kiva (with its team lending) is a great way for us to do that.
teams.description: Readers of Heidi Swanson's online recipe journal (blog) 101cookbooks.com

teams.name: Vancouver
teams.loan_because: We want to help.
teams.description: We are a group of people who want to make a difference in the world by helping those who have the desire and the passion to help themselves.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Zootopians United
teams.loan_because:
We have all been inspi(RED) ...
through a wonderous musical journey
… one heart, one hope, one love … 
ONE
teams.description: We are a group of U2 fans that have come together to make poverty history.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Gene Dunlap
teams.loan_because:
UPDATE: Due to the recent tragedy in Haiti, Gene's daughters have decided to withdraw 60% of the group funds to help send relief to the people of Haiti. Because of Gene's compassion for the innocence of children, his daughters have chosen Save the Children to receive this charitable donation. The girls have also decided to matched the funds withdrawn from Kiva to make a total donation of $1,600. 
Gene's daughters will continue loaning funds through Kiva .org indefinitely and hope to rebuild and grow the account in the near future.
teams.description: Save the Children is not only providing and distributing the basics to the people and children of Haiti, they are setting up Child Friendly Spaces planned for shelters and camps housing earthquake victims. These safe spaces protect children and give them a place to play and recover from the suffering they have endured and witnessed.

teams.name: Administrative Consultants Association
teams.loan_because: We believe in independance, financial freedom, self-sufficiency, self-determination and entrepreneurship.
teams.description: A group of Administrative Consultants helping support the entrepreneurial dreams and success of women around the world!

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.name: MIchigan State University
teams.loan_because: We want to give back!
teams.description: Philanthropic Michiganders

teams.name: Team Austin
teams.loan_because: Kiva, and the groups Kiva works with, are enabling people to improve their lives and the lives of other people in their community. Who wouldn't want to be a part of that!
teams.description: Our team is made up of people living in Austin, Tx. The people in Austin work in many jobs and professions. Our active interests in music, health, education, technology, science and the arts is something we all share. We value those people who have the courage to value creative people who are different from them (weird). Our unofficial city motto is "KEEP AUSTIN WEIRD." ;)

teams.name: Pepperdine University
teams.loan_because: Most of us had to depend on loans to be able to attend Pepperdine.  Since we were given help to achieve our career and life goals, we would like to do the same for others. Freely ye have recieved, freely give.
teams.description: Students, Faculty, Staff, Alumni, and Friends of Pepperdine University

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.loan_because: We loan, because we can.
teams.description: Lose affiliation of Twitteres from Norway.

Never underestimate that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world, indeed it's the only thing that ever has.                              
                                                                                                               Margaret Mead

teams.name: Lenders to the Developing World
teams.loan_because: We prefer to loan where the need is greatest, where our loans will do the most good & have the greatest impact.
teams.description:
* 80% of humanity lives on less than $10 a day
**Over three billion people live on less than $2.50 a day
*** 1.6 billion people — a quarter of humanity — live without electricity
**** 790 million people are chronically undernourished
***** 25,000 children die each day due to poverty

...from www.globalissues.org/article/26/poverty-facts-and-stats

teams.name: Indiana
teams.loan_because: We believe people around the world are connected and we can make a positive difference in others' lives.
teams.description:
Indiana is the 19th U.S. state and is located in the Midwest region of the United States of America. With over six million residents, it is ranked 15th in population and 17th in population density.

Indiana is a diverse state with a few large urban areas and a number of smaller industrial cities. It is best known for the Indianapolis 500 American automobile race, held annually over the Memorial Day weekend, and a strong basketball tradition, often called Hoosier Hysteria. Residents of Indiana are called Hoosiers. The state's name means "Land of the Indians."

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world: 
http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=indiana

To see a map showing where Indiana team members are located, click the link below.

teams.name: Presbyterian College Alumni and Friends
teams.loan_because:
Action speaks louder than words....
A story once read: A man walks down the beach littered with thousands of starfish washed in with the high tide.  As he walks he picks up one starfish after another and returns them to the ocean.  A observer comes up to the man and says.... why do you bother there are thousands of starfish and you can not possibly make a difference.  Our man of action replies as he returns another starfish to the sea..... It made a difference to that one!
teams.description: Alumni of a exception educational institution motivated to positive actions.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm

http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Chicago Critical Mass
teams.loan_because: we want to.
teams.description:
What is Critical Mass?

Critical Mass is a free, fun bike ride that happens on  the last Friday of every month in different cities all over the world.

It’s also a movement to promote the use of bicycles as a viable means of transportation.

It’s an open event that invites individuals to express themselves creatively, socially, politically, artistically, vocally, etc. to an audience of their friends, neighbors, coworkers, and fellow citizens.

It’s a wonderful bike party parade that celebrates the freedom of traveling under your own power and being part of the environment of the places you pass through.

It’s a reclamation of space, a demonstration to show that the city belongs to people, not machines.

Critical Mass is a free market of ideas so Critical Mass is whatever/whoever is at it. Critical Mass is a fantastic, fun time, so come join the ride!

(The Derailleur, June 2003)

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Bellinghamsters
teams.loan_because: We are lucky to live in one of the most beautiful and rich areas on the planet. We want to share our good fortune with others. We admire and respect those who are working to create good lives for themselves and others.
teams.description: We are residents of Bellingham, Washington in the Northwest of the United States of America. Our city is known for its rich culture, beautiful environment and healthy lifestyle.

teams.name: Days For Girls International Feminine Hygiene Program
teams.loan_because: Days For Girls provides washable, re-useable feminine hygiene kits to girls and women around the world so they can continue to go to school or work during their period.  Volunteers sew, pack, and send kits to areas all over the world to help girls and women continue school and care for their families every day.  This not only empowers girls and women but often helps their overall health and allows them to become better educated and more productive in their communities.
teams.description: We are women, men, and children working together around the world to make feminine hygiene kits for girls and women so they can stay in school or work during their period.

Or who just like Pittsburgh things such as Primanti Brothers, Iron City, Clark Bars, the Steelers, the Passion, the Pirates and the Pens. teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.description: Librarians, library students, and other information-profession-oriented folks dedicated to helping raise the standard of literacy and education in the developing world through giving people a boost out of poverty.

teams.loan_because: We want to provide Mongolians with access to credit to improve their businesses, homes & quality of life.
teams.description: We support Credit Mongol and its mission to contribute to the prosperity of Mongolians.

teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Team Ottawa
teams.loan_because: We can make a difference! Parce qu'on peut faire une difference!
teams.description: We are lenders from the region of Canada's capital!  Nous sommes des preteurs de la region de la capitale du Canada!

teams.name: Cats Are People Too.
teams.loan_because: We, the lovers of cats, loan  because it makes us sad to see how tragic are some lives simply because they are poor.  That can, and must change, and it will change.  The world can never be purrfect, but it can be happier!
teams.description: How can we cat lovers help you?  We don't have much, but we're willing to share, IF you are willing to help yourselves.  We only want for this world to be a better place, for everyone, even cats.

teams.name: Carleton University
teams.description: Interested and socially aware

teams.name: Let's Lend $40,000
teams.loan_because:
Because we want to increase peace and understanding in the world we all share.

Our goal is to reach loans totalling $40,000. 

This team was started on October 18, 2008.
teams.description:
This is a group of total strangers who all want to help out OTHER total strangers.

Many of us have been there from the beginning, when our total loans were around $5000. It is amazing and wonderful how fast we've been able to grow. 

Every one of our transactions connects people around the world who want what we all want from life -to have the dignity that comes from honest labor, to put food on the table, to see our children grow up healthy and strong, and help the next generation have more opportunities than we ourselves had.

Our first goal was $10,000. When we reached that we set our sights on $20,000. 

Now that we have hit $20,000, we are going for $40,000 in loans.

teams.name: Kanata Lenders
teams.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be able to loan
teams.description: We are a group of people in Kanata, Ontario, Canada

teams.name: Wiccans, (neo)Pagans, Witches and fellows
teams.loan_because: It does not harm so we do as we will
teams.description:
Open team. If you're a Wiccan or a Pagan, please join and show the World we exist and we're doing well.
[logo info: www.conjure.com/inspired.html]

teams.name: Kiva Team Captains
teams.loan_because: We want to bring people together to raise awareness about Kiva in our communities.
teams.description: This group is about empowering Team Captains to become Community Marketers.  It is our goal to provide Kiva's biggest advocates with more tools to spread the word about Kiva.

teams.name: Maria Shriver + A Woman's Nation
teams.loan_because: For as little as $25, we can help women entrepreneurs right in our own backyard.
teams.description:
Continuing what she began as First Lady of California, Maria Shriver and A Woman’s Nation are partnering with Kiva, the world's first person-to-person microlending website, to empower thousands of women across America to become more financially independent. Our partnership shows that every loan you make to a woman entrepreneur – even $25 – will make a real difference. 

As "The Shriver Report: A Woman’s Nation Pushes Back from the Brink"* states, 1 in 3 American women lives on or near the brink of poverty. By starting or expanding her own business, a woman can lift herself and her family off the brink. JOIN US in moving women and families forward!

A Woman’s Nation™ is a nonprofit organization founded by Maria Shriver that imagines a new way forward for women and men, girls and boys. Through its multimedia initiatives and innovative partnerships, A Woman's Nation informs, inspires, and implements bold ideas into action with the goal of creating a culture where all lives and all work are respected, recognized, and valued. To learn more please visit AWomansNation.org.
 
* A project of A Woman's Nation, produced in partnership with Center for American Progress.

teams.name: Kivans Against Cockfighting Loans
teams.loan_because: KACL believes in the power of microloans and the potential of Kiva, but we believe Kiva should not list loans related to Cockfighting (or Dog Fighting, Bull Fighting, or any other blood sports).
teams.description: We want to help people escape poverty, and avoid the promotion and celebration of extreme cruelty.

teams.name: Kivas for Divas
teams.loan_because: We believe every woman is a Diva. There are certain circumstances (government, culture etc) that prevent them from realizing their full full potential. We want to empower women so that they can make positive changes in their communities.
teams.description: Friends around the world that believe that action speaks volumes louder than words.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

KivaTools:
http://kivatools.com/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Heartland Oklahoma Team
teams.loan_because: Oklahomans are always willing to lend a hand to our neighbors as well as to total strangers.
teams.description: An active team of Oklahomans joining together to fund loans, work toward goals, and have fun with Kiva loan challenges.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Kiva Team Italia - Italy
teams.loan_because:
"Migliorare la vita degli altri migliora anche la tua" ....   .....  ...........
Improving lives of others also improves yours
teams.description:
Una bella fotografia della nostra splendida realtà… Bellissima, variegata, colorata, vivace… unica…. Italiana!!!!

--------------------------------

A beautiful picture of our wonderful reality… Beautiful, varied, colorful, lively.... unique……. Italian!

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Edmonton Alberta
teams.loan_because:
We live in the best country in the world and Kiva represents the entrepreneurial spirit that created it.
It is the "pay it forward" ideology!
teams.description: Edmontonians who want to make a difference at a grass roots level and feel that government and big organisations cannot and will not do enough.

teams.name: SIFE MacEwan
teams.loan_because: We believe in an equitable world where opportunity and ability should be available to all.  No matter how difficult or challenging to accomplish, every small step towards that goal is a step in the right direction.
teams.description: SIFE MacEwan is about building a stronger community through student involvement. It's about students taking charge of business projects and implementing them within the community. Its about teaching, helping, learning and most of all having fun.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Wendy and Lawrence's Wedding
teams.loan_because: Instead of giving traditional favors at our wedding, we decided to make  donations to charities which we believe in on behalf of our guests.  We are grateful for what we have, and would like to use this opportunity to share our passion and gratitude with our close friends and family.  We hope that our little effort here can provide opportunities for the less fortunate ones.

teams.name: Friends of Mitra Usaha Kecil
teams.loan_because:
We care deeply about Mitra Usaha Kecil's (Micro Enterprise Partners) mission to support microentrepreneurs, empower the poor, and preserve the environment.

We encourage you to loan through Kiva's Field Partner Mitra Usaha Kecil.
teams.description: We are lenders who support the borrowers of microfinance institution Koperasi Mitra Usaha Kecil (Micro Enterprise Partners) located in Bali, Indonesia.

teams.name: Washington State
teams.loan_because: Each of us has a responsibility to all of us.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Texas
teams.loan_because: Texas does it bigger!

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.
